definition: red food dye made from yeast

sentences.english: The production experiment of red koji was conducted with millet as raw material and Monascus purpureus being inoculated.
sentences.chinese: 红曲是一种天然红色素，传统生产工艺以籼米为原料。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a haw monascus health product comprising haws and monascus raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 一种山楂红曲保健品，由山楂和红曲原料制成。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a haw monascus health product comprising haws and monascus raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 一种山楂红曲保健品，由山楂和红曲原料制成。

sentences.english: Hongqu has a long history as a traditional food.
sentences.chinese: 红曲是一种传统的食品，在我国具有悠久的历史。

sentences.english: I don't know the cost of the Red Yeast Rice, but I'm sure it isn't as much as Lipitor.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道红曲米的价格是多少，但肯定没有胆固清贵。

sentences.english: Monascus pigment is an excellent stainer .
sentences.chinese: 红曲色素是优良的着色剂。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Under the optimized culture condition, a Red Yeast Rich with high pigment value and more red color hue was obtained.
sentences.chinese: 在优化工艺条件下，可得到偏红色调高色价红曲米。

sentences.english: Besides, liquor tasting results showed that the aroma and the taste of monascus base liquor got improved evidently.
sentences.chinese: 品酒结果表明，红曲基酒的香气和口味得到明显改善。

sentences.english: Steamer one opened, red yeast rice aroma first aroma.
sentences.chinese: 蒸笼一掀开，红曲香味先扑鼻。

sentences.english: Feed stimulating experiments were used to confirm precursors of monascus pigments.
sentences.chinese: 采用刺激实验法确定红曲色素的合成前体。

sentences.english: Red koji is also named Dan koji that belong to the fermented product with high-tech of biology.
sentences.chinese: 红曲亦名丹曲，属生物科技含量较高的酿造制品。

sentences.english: Conclusion Monascin can adjust the serum lipid.
sentences.chinese: 结论红曲具有调节血脂作用。

sentences.english: So the polyketide pathway is presumed to be the main biosynthetic pathway of antibiotic monascus pigments.
sentences.chinese: 所以聚酮途径被认为是红曲色素合成的主要途径。

sentences.english: However, red kojic red and gardenia blue have no antioxidant activity.
sentences.chinese: 而红曲米色素和栀子蓝色素不具有抗氧活性。

sentences.english: The history of red koji brewing technique in ancientry is introduced in this article.
sentences.chinese: 该文主要介绍了酿造红曲古工艺历史资料的查询结果。

sentences.english: Establish a analysis method of isoenzyme to classification of origin fungi of the Chinese traditional medicine, Hongqu.
sentences.chinese: 探讨中药红曲基原真菌的同工酶分析方法。

definition: "yellow wine" (mulled rice wine, usually served warm)
Shaoxing wine a.k.a. "yellow wine", traditional Chinese wine made from glutinous rice and wheat
brewer's yeast/yeast for fermenting rice wine
ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
